entry.title: Three California Men Charged in Roseburg Pharmacy Burglary — All Later Released
entry.summary: Three California men are facing charges after a Roseburg pharmacy burglary early Friday. Police found evidence after their getaway vehicle crashed on Old Melrose Road. Two suspects posted bail and were released, while the third was cited at the hospital due to crash injuries.

entry.title: Douglas County Man Charged After Video Shows Dog Attacking Injured Deer
entry.summary: A Douglas County man faces felony animal abuse charges after a viral video showed him laughing as his dog attacked an injured deer in Sutherlin. Oregon State Police say the footage sparked public outrage and led to charges of aggravated animal abuse and harassing wildlife.

entry.title: Roseburg City Council findings released, after a nine month long investigation
